annotations.description: In this episode we make a Puritan cocktail which is a mashup of two of Leandro's favorite cocktails and invent a new character for the show. I tried doing a ...
annotations.title: If a Martini And An Alaska Had A Baby It Would Be The Puritan

textContent:
2oz (60ml) new world style gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Yellow Chartreuse
.5oz (15ml) Dry Vermouth
2 Dashes Feegans Orange Bitters
Lemon Twist

Stir and strain into nick and nora

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9WmJgvWuf4g
title: Puritan
